data.message: how do I take off the temporary Paris flag on my profile pic? im just curious

replies.message: Hi Maria. If you chose to make your profile picture temporary, it will automatically change back to your previous profile picture at the end of the specified time. To change your profile picture, just follow these steps: http://on.fb.me/1I8KBql. Thanks. -Kate
Just change your profile picture then you can change it back to the same photo if you want
Já chci na Facebooku vlajku Francie jak to mám udělat?
It's the french flag not the paris flag. Paris is a city in france not a nation. Do you even geography?
